patient_info: Inguinal hernia,Hypertension,Hoarse voice,Cardiomegaly,Abnormal aortic valve morphology,Mitral regurgitation,Aortic regurgitation,Abnormal left ventricle morphology,Fever,Palpitations,Dyspnea,Hemoptysis,Bronchiectasis,Decreased body weight,Ascending tubular aorta aneurysm,Abnormal left ventricular function,Abnormal B-type natriuretic peptide concentration,Productive cough
golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Marfan syndrome
2. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, vascular type
3. Loeys-Dietz syndrome
4. Aortic valve disease with associated connective tissue disorder (e.g., bicuspid aortic valve with aortopathy)
5. Endocarditis (infective or non-infective)
6. Ankylosing spondylitis with cardiac manifestations
7. Familial thoracic aortic aneurysm and dissection (FTAA/D)
8. Takayasu arteritis
9. Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) with associated heart failure
10. sarcoidosis with cardiac and pulmonary involvement

Please note that the list reflects a diverse range of potential diagnoses based on the clinical presentation provided, and further diagnostic testing would be required to confirm any of these conditions.
